Articles.Content:
The Orbital Jumper is my first successful orbit attempt. It\'s a semi-standard spaceplane with SSTO capabilities.

I am aware that the file is named 'Sub-Orbital Jumper'. I built and tested it before I considered trying to orbit it.

C7 Flight Pack and Tuned SAS are needed.
Nice - i like simple Plane-designs. Ill give it a spin
Cool. Let me know what you think.
